Have you ever signed up for a Reseller account to find the host nags you for:-
  • Using too much CPU? You have a dedicated CPU allowance, use as much as you want!
  • Too much Disk I/O? SSD Diskspace with generous I/O and IOP limits
  • Sending too many emails Accounts limited to 10,000 emails per day
  • Getting the server IP Blacklisted You have a dedicated IP through which you send your emails. Only you can get your IP blacklisted!
    • We automatically suspend compromised email accounts until their passwords are changed, removing the compromises.
    • We automatically block compromised Web Scripts from sending mail until you fix the scripts.
  • Using too much Bandwidth! Generous bandwidth limits, upgrade at any time
  • Using too many Inodes to create a backup. R1Soft Backup technology doesn't care how many inodes you use

We automatically notify you (not your customers) if you hit LVE limits for your information; however, since CloudLinux looks after this, we won't bother you any further.
